  • Quickly promoted to full-time at CAE for strong, on-time application deliveries.
  • Well-versed in object-oriented programming and design.
  • Built multiplayer, networked AR game with tangible interfaces for master’s project.
  • Continual use of Unity 3D for 3½ years.
  • Experience using the .NET Framework and .NET Core to build applications for Windows standalone and UWP.
  • Regularly practice testing methodologies, including via source-code debuggers and console printouts.
  • Knowledgeable of file-management practices such as code legibility and version control, including Git.
  • Student of UI and UX; excelled in course on usability testing and design and have carried that skill into work.
  • Worked in a pair to develop an indoor location system for Android mobile devices using Bluetooth Low Energy.
  • Written multiple data-processing programs, including a parser for a context-free grammar and a metacompiler.
  • Highly familiar with Microsoft Visual Studio, Office products, and Windows.
  • Experience navigating Linux computers and using the command line.
  • Oversaw a staff of 21 as editor of Nebo: A Literary Journal to ensure careful construction of a quality periodical.
  • Able to read Spanish; conversational speaking and listening ability.
  • Exceptional communication skills, demonstrated by high GPA in English and creative writing.
